Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh

Summary: STOMP based websocket proposal

Comment: Issue/comment imported from : https://github.com/HL7/fhircast-docs/issues/61

"Based on the discussions in the 20th connecthaton WGM, I wrote down a proposed fhir-cast websocket spec."

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: STOMP based websocket proposal

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira on behalf of @bvdh

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

isaacvetter commented on Issue #157

Resolution: Considered for future use

Websocket support is critical path for FHIRcast, we still need more implementer feedback and experience. Following STU1 ballot, will publish #57 and specifically test websocket support at connectathon in Sept.

Mover: Isaac, Niklas
Affirmative, Abstention, Negative: 14-0-0
